articles.description: All the latest Europa League reaction as Manchester United produce a stunning extra-time comeback to reach the semi-finals as Tottenham win in Frankfurt but Rangers lose.
articles.title: Europa League reaction LIVE: Man Utd produce stunning comeback as Spurs win and Rangers lose

articles.description: After their sensational Europa League comeback win over Lyon, Manchester United are just three games from a trophy in a comical season that could end in glory or embarrassment, writes Simon Stone.
articles.title: Manchester United 5-4 Lyon: Ruben Amorim's side 'begin to show never-say-die DNA'

articles.description: Under-pressure Spurs boss Ange Postecoglou says reporters are "going to have to put up with me for a little bit longer" after his side reached the Europa League semi-finals.
articles.title: Eintract Frankfurt 0-1 Tottenham: Victory relieves some pressure on boss Ange Postecoglou

articles.description: With Trent Alexander-Arnold set to leave Anfield for Real Madrid, how do Liverpool replace him?
articles.title: Trent Alexander-Arnold: How do Liverpool replace Real Madrid-bound right-back?

articles.description: Ruben Amorim says he used Manchester United's famous 1999 Champions League final comeback win as "inspiration" for Thursday's Europa League triumph over Lyon.
articles.title: Man Utd: Ruben Amorim 'inspired' by 1999 heroics in Europa League win

articles.description: Justin Thomas equals the course record to take a three-shot lead in the opening round at the RBC Heritage.
articles.title: Justin Thomas equals course record to take three-shot lead at RBC Heritage

articles.description: Rangers' season is now over. But the work is jus beginning for the Ibrox club, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Rangers: Europa League run papered over cracks; now revolution required

articles.description: Chelsea book their place in the Conference League semi-finals despite a defeat by visitors Legia Warsaw in the second leg.
articles.title: Chelsea 1-2 Legia Warsaw: Blues reach Conference League semi-finals despite defeat

articles.description: Chris Dobey wins his first Premier League night of 2025 with a 6-2 win over Stephen Bunting on an evening of shocks in Rotterdam.
articles.title: Premier League Darts results: Chris Dobey beats Stephen Bunting in Rotterdam final

articles.description: Top seed Carlos Alcaraz eases into the quarter-finals of the Barcelona Open with a 6-2 6-4 win over Laslo Djere 6-2 6-4.
articles.title: Barcelona Open: Carlos Alcaraz beats Laslo Djere in straight sets to reach quarter-finals
